titleStmt.title: Epigrams and satyres: made by Richard Middleton of Yorke gentleman
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Richard, of York.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Ioseph Harison dwelling at the signe of the Grey-hound in Pater Noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: "Times metamorphosis" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
